channel.title: Docker Compose on Micronaut MuShop
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Compose on Micronaut MuShop

item.title: [Local] Docker compose
item.description: The complete MuShop application can be run using docker-compose locally. Default Configuration The default configuration that the docker-compose file uses is to be offline. When using docker-compose some services are not available, such as publishing the newsletter which uses an Oracle Cloud Function, however the remaining services are functional. Prerequisites You need Docker and Docker Compose installed locally and at least 8GB of resources assigned to Docker in order to run instances of Oracle database within containers.
